excerpt.rendered:
Welcome to Country Bank.

Relationships matter to us. We’ve gone above and beyond for our customers since 1850 because we think it’s just what you do for your neighbors. We value respect, courtesy, and good manners above all, and as a mutual bank we answer to our customers first, not to investors. We’re smaller than the regional banks, so we can provide our customers with the local management and friendly, personalized service they deserve.
